goal.en: To understand the design and applications of various types foundations.
goal.ch: 讓學生了解基礎種類與設計，基礎工程課的延伸課程

content.en: "Foundation of a structure is used to support the weight and the load and transmit it to underlying soils or rocks. Foundation design method depends on the field investigation results and types of structures to be supported. The course of foundation design is designed as an extension of foundation engineering, and the topics that will be introduced are: (1) Basic Concepts of Foundation Design (2)Field Investigation and In-Situ/Laboratory Testing (3) Shallow Foundations (4) Deep Foundations (5) Sheet Pile Walls (6) Braced Cuts (7) Preparation of Geotechnical Report"
content.ch: 基礎是建物構造的一部分，其功用為支撐上部結構物重量及載重並有效地將其傳遞至下方之土壤或岩石。本課程為基礎工程課程延伸，分以下主題介紹基礎相關之分析與設計：(1)基礎設計之概念 (2)現場調查及試驗 (3)淺基礎分析設計 (2)深基礎分析設計 (3)板樁牆設計 (4)開挖支撐 (5)邊坡與擋土牆分析 (6)大地工程報告撰寫

textbook.en: "Principles of Foundation Engineering, 6th edition, B.M. Das The Engineering of Foundations, R. Salgado (Class notes will be used as primary learning materials, references will be provided as needed)"
textbook.ch: 建築技術規則建築構造編 – 基礎構造設計規範

grading.ch: 期中考30%，期末報告40%，作業20%，平時成績10%

en.competency: The Ability of Planning and Implementing Research Projects
The Ability in Writing Technical Papers
The Ability in Research, Innovation, and Problem Solving
The Ability of Interdisciplinary Integration and Coordination
International Perspective and Concept of Sustainable Development

ch.competency: 策劃及執行專題研究之能力
研發創新及獨立解決問題之能力
跨領域協調整合之能力
國際觀及永續發展理念
領導、管理及規劃之能力
終身自我學習成長之能力

en: Department:Department of Civil Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Course blockingCI3003、Course blockingCI3010 only.
Department:MSc in Civil Engineering、PhD in Civil Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限土木工程學系。指定課程:必須擋修CI3003、擋修CI3010。
系所:限土木工程學系碩士班、土木工程學系博士班。
